Authentication is cookie-based (HttpOnly). After logging in via /auth/login or /auth/register, 
Postman will automatically handle the session cookie for subsequent protected requests.
Protected routes are marked with a `security` requirement.
Replace `{{bookId}}` (collection variable) with an ID from a created book for relevant tests.
